posts.post_content:
All prices are net to me and include insured delivery to you.  I collect sales tax from New York delivery addresses.  These are from a recently inherited tobacco card collection.  "I'll take it" trumps any negotiations.

See scans of all cards here:  [URL="https://flic.kr/s/aHsmXgUYsh"]T202 Scans[/URL]

A Great Batsman  Bergen/Rucker  Good+ (light creases)     75.
Ambrose McConnell at bat   Blair/Quinn    Good+ (light crease)    75.
Chase guarding first    Gibson/Liefield  Poor-fair (heavy creases)     60.
Chase ready for the squeeze play   Magee/Paskert   VG+     100.
Close at the plate   Payne/White   Good+ (small crease)     75.
Collins easily safe   Collins/Murphy   Good (light center crease & tiny corner crease)   200.
Donlin out at first   Dooin/Magee   poor-fair (heavy creases)   55.
Evers makes a safe slide   Archer/Reulbach   Good+ (light center crease)   75.
Hal Chase too late  Mclean/Suggs   Good+ (light creases)   75.
Hartzell covering third   Dahlen/Scanlan   Good+ (light center crease)   85 (SOLD)
Held at third   Lord/Tannehill   poor-fair (heavy center crease)   55. (SOLD)
Jim Delahanty at bat   Delahanty/Jones   Good+ (center crease)  75.
Just before the battle   Marquard/Meyers   poor (heavy creases)   125.
Scrambling back to first   Chase/Wolter   Good (light creases)  75. (SOLD)
Sweeney gets Stahl   Ford/Sweeney    this one is not cut right/trimmed - 25.(SOLD)
Tenney Lands Safely Latham/Raymond   Poor-fair (heavy center crease)   55.
The athletic infield   Brown/Graham   poor (heavy creasing, writing on reverse)   125.
Too late for Devlin   Marquard/Meyers   poor-fair (paper loss on back)  125.

Scrambling back to first Chase/Wolter Good (light creases) 75.

I'll take it! (Please)
